NetSparkleUpdater.​SignatureVerifiers.​DSAChecker
NetSparkleUpdater.​Interfaces.​ISignatureVerifier
public
NetSparkleUpdater.​SignatureVerifiers.​DSAChecker

Class that allows you to verify a DSA signature of some text, a file, or some other item based on a DSA public key

Variables
_cryptoProvider
private DSACryptoServiceProvider _cryptoProvider
Functions

DSAChecker
public DSAChecker(
SecurityMode mode,
string publicKey = null,
string publicKeyFile = "NetSparkle_DSA.pub"
)

Create a DSAChecker object from the given parameters

Parameters
mode
SecurityMode

The SecurityMode of the validator. Controls what needs to be set in order to validate an app cast and its items.

publicKey
string

the DSA public key as a string (will be used instead of the file if available, non-null, and not blank)

publicKeyFile
string

the public key file name (including extension)
